item.title: Red Dwarf
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
The Minotaur:

I think that might be because that was a direct Pirate, but this is an edited version of Red Dwarf. Not that bad.

I think its the contents of the torrent that are bad, rather than the torrents themselves.

Even if it’s been edited I guess it still technically counts as infringement. I don’t have a problem with torrents (etc.) for things like Red Dwarf, but I can understand why the mods wouldn’t want 'em on here.

item.title: Red Dwarf
item.dc:creator: Ford_Prefect
item.description:
I walked in while someone was watching a horse race on TV today, and one of the horses was named Mind That Bird, and every time they said it’s name I thought of…

Well, at least he gets 24 hours notice. That’s more than most of us get. All most of us get is, “Mind that bus!” “What bus?” Splat!

Read full topic

item.title: Red Dwarf
item.dc:creator: Alcator
item.description:
I owe to Red Dwarf the mental state of our son. I’ll explain: Before giving birth, my wife had to spend 2 months in the hospital. And all that time, she had a loop of all 52 episodes on the laptop that she took with her, and she was watching red dwarf for like 4 hours a day. So every week, she saw all the episodes, and she had a good time there. Our son is very positive-minded, full of laughter and smiles (he’s 19 months old )…

I know most episodes by heart and frequently use quotes in real-life situations.

Read full topic

item.title: Red Dwarf

item.description:
Ah ha! y’see, I recorded them on my ps3, high quality an all, but no laughter. So i got a torrent of the 3 episodes stitched together, with a laughter track added. The guy’s done a preeetty good job, imho.

item.title: Red Dwarf

item.description:
Yeah, my favorite season is season 6. But still, it was one amazing comedy series!

And hell yeah, cat is awesome!

PS: Definently saw the Dave special, kinda missed the canned\staged laughter eh?
